about_the_game:
Go, go, go, Star Guardians!

This Schwarzerblitz crossover DLC pack celebrates the Steam release of 8-Colors Star Guardians Plus and offers 6 new cosplay costumes for the game!

  • Amy - Star Guardian Emerald
  • Elena - Star Guardian Pink (Elena must be unlocked in order to use this costume)
  • Jenn - Star Guardian Blue
  • Kaya - Star Guardian Yellow (Kaya must be unlocked in order to use this costume)
  • K-069 - Star Guardian Red (K-069 must be unlocked in order to use this costume)
  • Donner - Prince Barion (Donner must be unlocked in order to use this costume)

One new monster-ridden stage!

  • Bramba's Pier (medium sized, ring-out on three sides)

One new sentaistic song!

This DLC adds a new song to the jukebox. The song will be selectable in Free Match as an available BGM.
  • "GO! GO! GO!", by Blast Harbour (feat. Yeszo) - Chapter 1 final boss theme of 8-Colors Star Guardians Plus
detailed_description:
Go, go, go, Star Guardians!

This Schwarzerblitz crossover DLC pack celebrates the Steam release of 8-Colors Star Guardians Plus and offers 6 new cosplay costumes for the game!

  • Amy - Star Guardian Emerald
  • Elena - Star Guardian Pink (Elena must be unlocked in order to use this costume)
  • Jenn - Star Guardian Blue
  • Kaya - Star Guardian Yellow (Kaya must be unlocked in order to use this costume)
  • K-069 - Star Guardian Red (K-069 must be unlocked in order to use this costume)
  • Donner - Prince Barion (Donner must be unlocked in order to use this costume)

One new monster-ridden stage!

  • Bramba's Pier (medium sized, ring-out on three sides)

One new sentaistic song!

This DLC adds a new song to the jukebox. The song will be selectable in Free Match as an available BGM.
  • "GO! GO! GO!", by Blast Harbour (feat. Yeszo) - Chapter 1 final boss theme of 8-Colors Star Guardians Plus

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel i5 (4th generation or higher)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4400
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 30 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7 (4th generation or higher)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel i7 (4th generation or higher)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 30 MB available space

short_description: Go, go, go, Star Guardians! This official collaboration between Schwarzerblitz and 8-Colors Star Guardians Plus brings a superheroic spin to your matches! Get 6 new cosplay costumes inspired by 8CSG and start fighting for Earth now! The DLC includes a stage and a new song for the jukebox/Free Match.
